subtree.speaker: King Nico
subtree.line: At ease. Oracle, I have summoned you here to make an important request.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: And what would you have me do, sire?

subtree.speaker: King Nico
subtree.line: I must report to you that Sir Anders is dead.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Dead? How can that be? I saw him on the grounds this morning.

subtree.speaker: King Nico
subtree.line: Poison. The knight died drinking from a goblet of wine intended for me. I cannot help but be ashamed that I could allow this to happen.

subtree.speaker: King Nico
subtree.line: We believe that this attempt on my life might be the machinations of a someone in the court. We are not sure who though.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: What do you intend to do, sir?

subtree.speaker: King Nico
subtree.line: As an oracle from the tower, you see things no one else can. Do you think you could help determine the traitor.

subtree.speaker: Oracle
subtree.line: Oh, sir. I can see what I can do. Though my readings are not always as forthcoming as one might desire them to be.

subtree.speaker: King Nico
subtree.line: You are one of the only people I can trust. And I fear something even more sinister is afoot than we might even imagine. Will you please help me?
